bookingComponent.notFound: Unfortunately, the requested offer could not be found.

steps.title: Step One
steps.description: Select a room, a sports ground or a resource that you would like to book and click on it.

steps.title: Step Two
steps.description: Find out about the facilities, booking periods, rules and general conditions.

steps.title: Step Three
steps.description: As soon as you have found the right room, sports ground or resource, click on the button at the bottom of the page to continue to the booking process.

steps.title: Step Four
steps.description: Enter your contact details on the following website, check your entries and send the request. As soon as it has been confirmed, you will receive an e-mail.
